translation.en: [Tally] Are there important documents in there?
translation.zh: 里面 装 了 重要 文件 吗 ？

translation.en: I'm a Sun Dog now?
translation.zh: 我 是 幻日 的 一 员 了 ？

translation.en: [Ned] Hey, Tally.
translation.zh: 塔莉

translation.en: They fly today.
translation.zh: 他们 今天 飞行

translation.en: We should go.
translation.zh: 我们 应该 去

translation.en: I haven't heard from Jenkins.
translation.zh: 詹金斯 还 没 给 我 回音

translation.en: We should call the police.
translation.zh: 我们 应该 报警

translation.en: [Tally] Here we go.
translation.zh: 行动 吧

translation.en: Here.
translation.zh: 拿 去

translation.en: [Ned] Hello, there are terrorists at the airfield,
translation.zh: 喂 ？ 飞机场 有 恐怖 分子

translation.en: with bomb-making equipment.
translation.zh: 他们 带 着 炸弹 设备

translation.en: They're Al-Qaeda and they plan to strike today.
translation.zh: 他们 是 基地 组织   他们 计划 今天 出击

translation.en: Congratulations, you just saved the world.
translation.zh: 恭喜 你 救 了 全世界

translation.en: What are they doing?
translation.zh: 他们 在 做 什么 ？

translation.en: They're flying model planes, Ned.
translation.zh: 他们 在 玩模型 飞机   奈德

translation.en: You wanna know why you don't drive, Ned?
translation.zh: 你 想 知道 你 为什么 不 开车 吗 ？

translation.en: You don't drive because you rode the short bus your entire life.
translation.zh: 你 不 开车 是 因为 你 一向 搭 复康 巴士

translation.en: Where'd this come from?
translation.zh: 这是 哪 来 的 ？

translation.en: eBay.
translation.zh: eBay 网站

translation.en: eBay?
translation.zh: eBay ？

translation.en: It's just a deck of cards.
translation.zh: 这 只是 一 副 纸牌

translation.en: You wanna chase some pretend terrorists? Go! Go chase some pretend terrorists.
translation.zh: 你 想 追假 想 的 恐怖 分子   就 去 追假 想 的 恐怖 分子

translation.en: -Why are you doing this? -'Cause you're a retard, and...
translation.zh: - 你 为什么 这样 ？   - 因为 你 是 个 智障

translation.en: You're a virgin, and I hate your stupid guts.
translation.zh: 你 是 个 处 男   我 恨 你 的 愚蠢

translation.en: -[officer] Don't move. Don't move. -[indistinct radio chatter]
translation.zh: 不 许动

translation.en: Hands up.
translation.zh: 手举 起来

translation.en: I bet this Bautista de Anza's gold is still out there.
translation.zh: 我 敢 打赌   鲍提斯塔德 安萨 黄金 还 在 外头

translation.en: [Ned] So why don't you go get it?
translation.zh: 那 你 何不 去 拿 它 ？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么 ？

translation.en: [Ned] Why don't you go get it?
translation.zh: 你 何不 去 拿 它 ？

translation.en: Ned, take the head off, will you, please? It's depressing enough around here.
translation.zh: 奈德   请 拿 掉头 套   这里 已经 够 让 人 沮丧 的 了

translation.en: I said, why don't you go get it? 'Cause I don't exactly know where it is.
translation.zh: - 我 说 你 何不 去 拿 它 ？   - 因为 我 不 知道 它 在 哪

translation.en: I'd need a hell of a metal detector.
translation.zh: 我 得要 有 超强 的 金属 探测器

translation.en: [Ned] What?
translation.zh: 什么 ？

translation.en: I said I'd need a metal detector.
translation.zh: 我 说 我 得要 有 金属 探测器

translation.en: [Ned] Dear Master Sergeant Jenkins, I resign. Sincerely, Ned Chipley.
translation.zh: 亲爱 的 詹金 斯士 官长   我 辞职   诚挚 的 奈德敬 上

translation.en: I'm worried about you, man.
translation.zh: 我 为 你 担心

translation.en: You've been down here a week.
translation.zh: 你 在 地下室 一 星期 了

translation.en: The holidays are brutal enough without you going Howard Hughes on me.
translation.zh: 圣诞 假期 已经 够 难捱 的 了   你 还 对 我 避而不见

translation.en: What do you think about taking that thing off your head
translation.zh: 能 不 能 把 头上 那 东西 拿 下来

translation.en: so we can have a little man to man?
translation.zh: 好 让 我们 男人 对 男人 交谈 ？

translation.en: Okay, listen.
translation.zh: 好 吧   听 着

translation.en: I came to apologize.
translation.zh: 我 是 来 道歉 的

translation.en: I didn't consider the ramifications of any of this.
translation.zh: 我 没 考虑 到会 有 这样 的 结果

translation.en: I was flippant. A man should never be flippant.
translation.zh: 我 的 态度 轻浮   男人 不 该 态度 轻浮

translation.en: You'll never be a Marine, Ned. I shoulda told you that.
translation.zh: 你 永远 不 可能 成为 陆战 队员   我 应该 告诉 你 的

translation.en: You have a condition that renders you unable to meet our standards.
translation.zh: 你 的 状况 使 你 达 不 到 我们 的 标准

translation.en: Those are the facts whether we like it or not.
translation.zh: 事实 就是 如此   不论 我们 喜 不 喜欢

translation.en: I should've bucked up and told you just like I tell anybody else who doesn't meet the requirements.
translation.zh: 我 应该 勇敢 地 拒绝 你   就 像 我 拒绝

translation.en: just like I tell anybody else who doesn't meet the requirements.
translation.zh: 其他 资格 不符 的 人 那样

translation.en: You need a cause, son, a purpose.
translation.zh: 你 需要 一个 理想 或 目标   孩子

translation.en: Every man does.
translation.zh: 每个 人 都 需要

translation.en: But this...
translation.zh: 但 这个 …

translation.en: this is not it.
translation.zh: 不是 这个

translation.en: Can you stand and give me a salute?
translation.zh: 你 能 不 能 站 起来 向 我 敬礼 ？

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 圣诞节 快乐

translation.en: [Bob] Ned, something came in the mail for you.
translation.zh: 奈德   有 你 的 邮件

translation.en: It's from your mom and your ex-girlfriend.
translation.zh: 你 妈 和 你 的 前 女友 寄来 的

translation.en: [Tally] Ned, I suck!
translation.zh: 奈德   我 太 烂 了 ！

translation.en: Those things I said to you are unforgivable.
translation.zh: 我 对 你 说 的 那些 话 不可 原谅

translation.en: I don't know what else to say except I'll try to make it up to you.
translation.zh: 我 不 知道 还 能 说 什么   只能 说 我 会 补偿 你

translation.en: I promise.
translation.zh: 我 保证

translation.en: Well, I finally did it.
translation.zh: 我 终于 做到 了

translation.en: I finally came to San Francisco because of you.
translation.zh: 因为 你   我 终于 来到 旧金山

translation.en: It's just as pretty as my mom always said it was.
translation.zh: 这里 如同 我 妈 说 的 那么 美

translation.en: If you ever come out here, you should come visit.
translation.zh: 你 要是 来 这里   应该 来 拜访 我

translation.en: It's just a crappy dorm room, but I got into that film camp.
translation.zh: 虽然 这是 间 粗陋 的 宿舍   但 我 进入 影艺 训练营 了

translation.en: I sent them the videos from the stakeout and they gave me a scholarship.
translation.zh: 我 把 监视 影片 寄给 他们   他们 给 我 奖学金

translation.en: Those stakeouts were the best time I ever had.
translation.zh: 监视 的 那些 日子 是 我 最 快乐 的 日子

translation.en: I hope you can forgive me, Ned.
translation.zh: 希望 你 能 原谅 我   奈德

translation.en: I don't know what I would've done without you.
translation.zh: 我 真 不 知道 没有 你   我 会 做出 什么 事

translation.en: Love, Tally.
translation.zh: 爱 你 的 塔莉 上

translation.en: P.S. The bridge is amazing!
translation.zh: （ 附言 ： 金门 大桥 美极 了 ！ ）

translation.en: -[knocking on door] -[Bob yelling] Ned!
translation.zh: 奈德 ！

translation.en: -[knocking continues] -eBay!
translation.zh: eBay ！

translation.en: Come on, let's try this sucker out!
translation.zh: 快 来   我们 来 试试 这 玩意

translation.en: [Bob] Well, I hear you, Ned, but that's not what happened, is it?
translation.zh: 我 听见 了   奈德   但 结果 不是 那样   对 吧 ？

translation.en: -[Ned] No. -[Bob chuckles] That's right.
translation.zh: - 对   - 没错

translation.en: Let me tell you what my father used to say.
translation.zh: 让 我 告诉 你 以前 我 爸 常 说 的话

translation.en: My father used to say, "If ifs and buts were candies and nuts, we'd all have a hell of a Christmas.
translation.zh: 我 爸 常 说 “ 假如 ‘ 如果 ’   和 ‘ 但是 ’ 是 糖果 和 坚果

translation.en: "If ifs and buts were candies and nuts, we'd all have a hell of a Christmas.
translation.zh: 那 我们 在 圣诞节 就 乐 翻天 了

translation.en: But we're not having a hell of a Christmas."
translation.zh: 但 我们 在 圣诞节 没有 乐翻天 ”

translation.en: And what that means is, things are what things are,
translation.zh: 那 意思 是 事情 已 成 定局

translation.en: no matter how you think they could have been.
translation.zh: 你 后悔 也 没有 用

translation.en: Ned, work a little bit over here. You're going in a goddamn circle.
translation.zh: 奈德   过来 这边 找找   你 在 绕圈子

translation.en: [Ned] It would be easier during the day. [Bob] Yes, it would be easier during the day, but...
translation.zh: - 白天 找 比较 容易   - 对   白天 找 比较 容易

translation.en: Jerry told me he thinks the company hired some guy to watch during the day.
translation.zh: 但 杰瑞 告诉 我   他 认为 公司 雇 了 人 在 白天 监视

translation.en: Try to get a picture of me doing something physical,
translation.zh: 想 拍到 我 从事 体力 劳动 的 照片

translation.en: then they'll never settle the case.
translation.zh: 那 他们 就 绝不 会 和解

translation.en: 'Course they'll probably never settle it anyway, on account of it's not their fault.
translation.zh: 当然 他们 可能 就是 不 会 和解   理由 是 那 并非 他们 的 错

translation.en: But what the hell. We'll get rich the old-fashioned way.
translation.zh: 但 管 它 的   我们 就 用 传统 方法 来 发财

translation.en: -Oh. -[Bob] You got something?
translation.zh: 你 探测 到 什么 吗 ？

translation.en: Here, let's switch.
translation.zh: 给 你   我们 交换

translation.en: Good. Good.
translation.zh: 很 好

translation.en: I gotta hand it to you, Ned, you're a hard worker.
translation.zh: 我 得 称赞 你   你 做事 勤奋

translation.en: And you know enough to keep your mouth shut.
translation.zh: 而且 你 懂得 守口如瓶

translation.en: People like to have a guy like that around.
translation.zh: 这种 人 会 讨人喜欢

translation.en: And you're an optimistic son of a bitch.
translation.zh: 而且 你 非常 乐观

translation.en: I've seen you fail at more things most people wouldn't even begin to wanna try.
translation.zh: 你 失败 的 次数 多 过   多数 人 愿意 尝试 的 次数

translation.en: I don't wanna fail.
translation.zh: 我 不 想 失败

translation.en: Well, then you gotta stop doing things that you're not qualified for.
translation.zh: 那 就 别 再 做 你 能力 不及 的 事

translation.en: Shit! When I was a kid, I wanted to play for the Tigers...
translation.zh: 我 小时候 想 加入 底特律 老虎 …

translation.en: but I didn't have the ability to play in the Major League.
translation.zh: 但 我 没有 打职 棒 的 能力

translation.en: See, for me, that was an unrealistic goal.
translation.zh: 对 我 而言   那 是 个 不切实际 的 目标

translation.en: So I had to drive a truck for a living. I was a damn good truck driver.
translation.zh: 所以 我 只得 开 卡车 维生   我 是 很 棒 的 卡车 司机

translation.en: And... that's the best you can do.
translation.zh: 那 就是 最 合宜 的 做法

translation.en: -My mom says that if I-- -Ned, if you don't mind, please.
translation.zh: - 我 妈 说 如果 我 …   - 奈德   如果 你 不 介意

translation.en: I don't wanna talk about your mom right now.
translation.zh: 我 现在 不 想 谈 你 妈

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Listen to me.
translation.zh: 听 我 说

translation.en: Don't stop digging. "Listen to me" doesn't mean stop digging.
translation.zh: 继续 挖   “ 听 我 说 ” 不 表示 停 下来

translation.en: The bottom line, things aren't so bad.
translation.zh: 底线 是   情况 还 不错

translation.en: You got your health.
translation.zh: 你 拥有 健康

translation.en: People seem to like you, and what else? You got money. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你 似乎 讨人喜欢   而且 你 有钱

translation.en: Two big things, your health and money.
translation.zh: 两 大 要素   你 的 健康 和 金钱

translation.en: You could practically do anything that you want,
translation.zh: 你 几乎 想 做 什么 都 可以

translation.en: so long as you don't keep setting these unrealistic goals.
translation.zh: 只要 你 别 再 设定 不切实际 的 目标

translation.en: Listen, if I were you, right off the bat,
translation.zh: 如果 我 是 你   从 一开始

translation.en: I would rule out anything that required you to take a test.
translation.zh: 我 就 会 排除 任何 需要 考试 的 工作

translation.en: -[Bob] Is that a car? -[Ned] Car.
translation.zh: - 那 是 汽车 吗 ？   - 汽车

translation.en: [Bob] Shit! Get down!
translation.zh: 该死 ！ 蹲下 ！

translation.en: You see it?
translation.zh: 你 看 得到 它 吗 ？

translation.en: -[Ned] Yeah. -[Bob] Is it gone?
translation.zh: - 对   - 它 走 了 吗 ？

translation.en: They're gone.
translation.zh: 他们 走 了

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Hey, what did that Jenkins fella say?
translation.zh: 詹金斯 说 了 什么 ？

translation.en: A man needs a purpose.
translation.zh: 每个 人 都 需要 一个 目标

translation.en: He's absolutely right, hundred percent.
translation.zh: 他 说 得 完全 正确

translation.en: What do you wanna do with your life, Ned?
translation.zh: 你 想 过 怎样 的 人生 ？

translation.en: What is your purpose?
translation.zh: 你 的 目标 是 什么 ？

translation.en: -I want to save lives. -Save lives, all right.
translation.zh: - 我 想 救人   - 救人   好

translation.en: Well, for starters, you're not gonna be a doctor, right?
translation.zh: 首先   你 不 会 当 医生   对 吧 ？

translation.en: Rule out anything in the medical profession.
translation.zh: 排除 医疗 相关 职业

translation.en: I mean, you got fired from one hospital already.
translation.zh: 你 已经 被 一家 医院 开除 过

translation.en: What else...
translation.zh: 还有 呢 ？

translation.en: Sherpa maybe? Maybe a Sherpa.
translation.zh: 或许 当雪 巴人 ？

translation.en: I read a book about climbing Everest, and...
translation.zh: 我 读 过 一 本 有关 攀登 珠穆朗玛峰 的 书 …

translation.en: sometimes someone keels over and the Sherpas save their lives.
translation.zh: 有时 有人 跌落   雪巴人 救 了 他们 的 命

translation.en: 'Course you might have to be an Indian or a mountain-person
translation.zh: 当然 你 必须 是 印地安人 或 山地 人

translation.en: or whatever the hell they are. All right, jot that down.
translation.zh: 不管 他们 是 什么 人   对   写 下来

translation.en: Here, I'll hold that for you.
translation.zh: 来   我 帮 你 拿 着 那个

translation.en: Maybe a Sherpa is not a good idea.
translation.zh: 也许 雪巴人 不是 个 好 主意

translation.en: I just can't figure out what else fits in that category.
translation.zh: 我 想 不 出 那 类 的 工作 还有 什么

translation.en: -I could be a catcher in the rye. -I don't what that is.
translation.zh: - 我 可以 当 麦田 捕手   - 我 不 知道 那 是 什么

translation.en: I mean, I know it's a book, but I don't know what the hell
translation.zh: 我 知道 那 是 一 本书   但 我 不 知道

translation.en: that has to do with what we're talking about here.
translation.zh: 那 和 我们 谈 的 事 有 什么 关系

translation.en: It's someone who catches kids after they fall off cliffs.
translation.zh: 他 在 小孩 掉下 悬崖 时 抓住 他们

translation.en: Okay, no!
translation.zh: 好   不行 ！

translation.en: See, Ned, this is an example of where you go a little askew.
translation.zh: 这就 是 你 偏离 现实 的 例子

translation.en: You can't catch somebody after they fall off a cliff.
translation.zh: 你 无法 抓住 掉下 悬崖 的 人

translation.en: I mean, you can, but that's comic book stuff,
translation.zh: 除非是 在 漫画 里 才 可以

translation.en: that's super hero stuff.
translation.zh: 那 是 超级 英雄 漫画

translation.en: I mean, you can prevent somebody before they fall off a cliff,
translation.zh: 如果 你 要 阻止 他们 掉下 悬崖

translation.en: that's another thing, but once they go over, they go over.
translation.zh: 那 是 另 一 回 事   但 他们 要是 掉 下去 就 掉 下去 了

translation.en: And catching somebody falling off a cliff is not a job.
translation.zh: 而且 抓住 掉下 悬崖 的 人 不是 一 种 工作

translation.en: See, that's off point.
translation.zh: 那 是 离题 了

translation.en: That's not something you should even be talking about.
translation.zh: 那种 事 你 连谈 都 不 该 谈 的

translation.en: Now you got me talking about it.
translation.zh: 你 让 我 也 谈起 它 来 了

translation.en: Here.
translation.zh: 拿 去

translation.en: Where the hell is this catcher in the rye coming from?
translation.zh: 麦田 捕手 这 念头 是 哪 来 的 ？

translation.en: Tally.
translation.zh: 塔莉

translation.en: Tally.
translation.zh: 塔莉

translation.en: You know what, Ned?
translation.zh: 告诉 你   奈德

translation.en: There's no easy answers to life.
translation.zh: 人生 是 难解 的 习题

translation.en: Most of the time, we're all just stumbling around, you know.
translation.zh: 多半 时候 我们 只是 跌跌撞撞

translation.en: If you're lucky, things just come to you.
translation.zh: 幸运 的话   事情 会 明白 显现 给 你 知道

translation.en: Now, in my case, I should have realized what was going on with your mom.
translation.zh: 就 我 的 例子 来说   我 应该 知道 你 妈的 打算

translation.en: But I didn't.
translation.zh: 但 我 不 知道

translation.en: It didn't come to me.
translation.zh: 它 没有 明白 显现 给 我 知道

translation.en: But this information about Bautista de Anza's gold,
translation.zh: 但 鲍提斯塔德 安萨 黄金 的 信息

translation.en: that did come to me, so... you know, we work with what we got.
translation.zh: 明白 显现 给 我 知道   我们 只能 善用 现有 的 资源

translation.en: A man needs a purpose.
translation.zh: 每个 人 都 需要 一个 目标

translation.en: [Mother] Shh.There you go.
translation.zh: 好 了

translation.en: It's okay, little one.
translation.zh: 没事 的   小家伙

translation.en: [music playing from Mother] ♪ Moon river, wider than a mile ♪
translation.zh: 月 亮河   宽 过 一 里 多

translation.en: -♪ I'm-- ♪ -[beeps, song stops]
translation.zh: 我 会 嫣然 飘过 你

translation.en: -♪ Hold me close and hold me fast ♪ -[baby continues crying]
translation.zh: 快 抱住 我   紧紧 地 抱住 我

translation.en: ♪ The magic spell you-- ♪ [beeps, song stops]
translation.zh: 你 念出 的 魔法 咒语

translation.en: ♪ Baby mine, don't you cry ♪
translation.zh: 我 的 宝贝   不要 哭泣

translation.en: ♪ Baby mine, dry your eye ♪
translation.zh: 我 的 宝贝   擦干 眼泪

translation.en: -♪ Rest your head close to my heart ♪ -[crying]
translation.zh: 躺 在 我 胸口 睡 去 吧

translation.en: ♪ Never to part ♪ [wailing]
translation.zh: 永不 分离

translation.en: ♪ Baby of mine ♪
translation.zh: 我 的 宝贝

translation.en: ♪ Little one, when you play ♪
translation.zh: 小家伙   玩乐 时

translation.en: ♪ Don't you mind what they say ♪
translation.zh: 不要 在意   他人 言语

translation.en: ♪ Let those eyes sparkle and shine ♪
translation.zh: 让 那 双 眼   闪烁 光芒

translation.en: ♪ Never a tear, baby of mine ♪
translation.zh: 不要 流泪   我 的 宝贝

translation.en: -♪ From your head to your toes ♪ -♪ Baby mine ♪
translation.zh: 从头 到 脚   我 的 宝贝

translation.en: ♪ You're so sweet, goodness knows ♪ ♪ Baby mine ♪
translation.zh: 如此 可爱   老天 知道

translation.en: ♪ Baby mine ♪
translation.zh: 我 的 宝贝

translation.en: ♪ You are so precious to me ♪
translation.zh: 对 我 来说   你 最 珍贵

translation.en: ♪ Cute as can be ♪
translation.zh: 最最 可爱

translation.en: ♪ Baby of mine ♪
translation.zh: 我 的 宝贝

translation.en: ♪ Baby mine, baby mine ♪
translation.zh: 我 的 宝贝

translation.en: [Daughter] Why aren't there any more children, Mother?
translation.zh: 为什么 没有 其他 孩子   母亲 ？

translation.en: [Mother] There used to be.
translation.zh: 以前 有的

translation.en: Before the wars.
translation.zh: 在 战争 爆发 之前

translation.en: [Daughter] I don't want to be a human.
translation.zh: 我 不 想 做 人类

translation.en: [Mother] Why is that?
translation.zh: 为什么 ？

translation.en: [Daughter] They ruined everything.
translation.zh: 他们 毁 了 整个 世界

translation.en: [Mother] Humans can be wonderful.
translation.zh: 人类 也 有 好人

translation.en: [Daughter] Then why did you only make one?
translation.zh: 那 你 为什么 只 造 了 一个 人类 ？

translation.en: [Mother] Go ahead.
translation.zh: 去 吧

translation.en: Take a look.
translation.zh: 瞧 一 瞧

translation.en: My brothers and sisters are in those?
translation.zh: 我 的 弟弟 妹妹们 在 那些 东西 里面 ？

translation.en: [Mother] Would you like to meet them?
translation.zh: 你 想 见见 他们 吗 ？

translation.en: They're small now but, one day,
translation.zh: 他们 现在 还 很 小   但 有一天

translation.en: they'll be as big as you.
translation.zh: 他们 会 跟 你 一般 大

translation.en: Do you think I'll have a brother or a sister?
translation.zh: 我 会 有 个 弟弟 还是 妹妹 ？

translation.en: Which one would you like?
translation.zh: 你 更 想要 哪个 ？

translation.en: Both.
translation.zh: 两 个 都 想要

translation.en: A big, big family...
translation.zh: 一个 大家庭

translation.en: all together.
translation.zh: 生活 在一起

translation.en: Would that make you happy?
translation.zh: 那样 你 会 开心 吗 ？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 会

translation.en: That would make me happy too.
translation.zh: 我 也 会 开心

translation.en: Why couldn't we be born together?
translation.zh: 我们 为什么 不 能 一起 出生 ？

translation.en: Mothers need time to learn.
translation.zh: 母亲 需要 时间 学习

translation.en: Raising a good child...
translation.zh: 如何 养育 一个 好 孩子

translation.en: it's no small task.
translation.zh: 不是 简单 的 事情

translation.en: Do you think you'll be ready soon?
translation.zh: 你 快 准备 好 了 吗 ？

translation.en: Perhaps.
translation.zh: 也许 吧

translation.en: And then we can be a family?
translation.zh: 然后 我们 就 能 成为 一家人 了 ？

translation.en: We are a family.
translation.zh: 我们 就是 一家人

translation.en: [door beeps]  A big family, I mean.
translation.zh: 我 是 说 一个 大家庭

translation.en: Eventually.
translation.zh: 总 有 一 天

translation.en: What's wrong?
translation.zh: 怎么 了 ？

translation.en: How long's it been like that?
translation.zh: 这样 多久 了 ？

translation.en: -It's fine. -Mother...
translation.zh: - 没事   - 母亲

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 跟 我 来

translation.en: Better?
translation.zh: 好 点 了 吗 ？

translation.en: Much.
translation.zh: 好多 了

translation.en: [Mother] Imagine a doctor has five patients,
translation.zh: 想象 一 位 医生 有 五 个 病人

translation.en: all in need of different organ transplants,
translation.zh: 每个 人 都 需要 不同 的 器官 移植

translation.en: but no compatible organs are available.
translation.zh: 但 都 没有 匹配 的 器官

translation.en: One day, a sixth patient enters the doctor's office
translation.zh: 有一天   第六 位 患者 来 求医

translation.en: with a life-threatening condition.
translation.zh: 命悬 一线

translation.en: The new patient is curable, but also an organ match for the five other patients.
translation.zh: 新 病人 可 被 治愈   但 他 的 器官 与 五 位 病人 匹配

translation.en: If the doctor simply delays treatment, the new patient will die,
translation.zh: 如果 医生 延迟 治疗   新 病人 就 会 死去

translation.en: but their organs could be used to save the other five patients.
translation.zh: 但 他 的 器官 可以 用来 拯救   另外 五 名 病人

translation.en: If the doctor treats the new patient,
translation.zh: 如果 医生 救治 新 病人

translation.en: one life will be saved, but five others will be lost.
translation.zh: 就 能 救活 一 条 命   而 另外 五 个人 会 死去

translation.en: What is the doctor's best course of action?
translation.zh: 医生 最好 的 做法 是 什么 ？

translation.en: Daughter?
translation.zh: 女儿 ？

translation.en: Course of action?
translation.zh: 做法 ？

translation.en: Did you do your reading?
translation.zh: 你 读书 了 吗 ？

translation.en: Some.
translation.zh: 读 了 一些

translation.en: We can select a different text.
translation.zh: 我们 可以 换 材料

translation.en: However, your birthday is rapidly approaching and it would be a shame
translation.zh: 但 你 的 生日 快 到 了 如果 分数

translation.en: if your scores failed to meet the projections from last year's examination.
translation.zh: 没 能 达到 去年 考试 的 预期   那 就 太 可惜 了

translation.en: -But you set the pace, Daughter. -Bentham's fine.
translation.zh: - 但 你 说 了 算   女儿   - 边沁 挺 好的

translation.en: That's the spirit.
translation.zh: 要 有 这种 精神 才 对

translation.en: The fundamental axiom suggests
translation.zh: 基本 公理 表示

translation.en: that a person is morally obligated
translation.zh: 人 有 道德 上 的 义务

translation.en: to minimize the pain to the greatest number possible.
translation.zh: 尽可能 地 减少 痛苦

translation.en: Now, consider that you are the doctor
translation.zh: 现在   假设 你 是 医生

translation.en: and also the only organ match for your patients.
translation.zh: 也 是 病人们 唯一 的 器官 匹配者

translation.en: What then is the right choice?
translation.zh: 正确 的 选择 是 什么 ？

translation.en: I mean, Comte says I should be willing to suffer harm for the benefit of others.
translation.zh: 孔德 说 我 应该 愿意   为 他人 的 利益 承受 痛苦

translation.en: And do you agree?
translation.zh: 你 同意 吗 ？

translation.en: Well, do I know these five patients?
translation.zh: 我 认识 这 五 位 病人 吗 ？

translation.en: Are they good humans?
translation.zh: 他们 是 好人 吗 ？

translation.en: Honest, dishonest?
translation.zh: 诚 不 诚实 ？

translation.en: Lazy, hardworking?
translation.zh: 懒惰 还是 勤奋 ？

translation.en: I, a life-saving doctor,
translation.zh: 我 是 救命 的 医生

translation.en: might be giving my life for people who are murderers or thieves...
translation.zh: 可能 会 牺牲 自己   救活 了 谋杀犯 或 小偷 …

translation.en: who end up harming more people due to my sacrifice.
translation.zh: 我 的 牺牲   可能 会 导致 他们 伤害 更 多 人

translation.en: You don't feel that every human has intrinsic value
translation.zh: 你 不 觉得 每个 人 都 有 内在 价值

translation.en: and an equal right to life and happiness?
translation.zh: 享有 平等 的 生命 和 幸福 吗 ？

translation.en: I did last month, when you were teaching Kant.
translation.zh: 上个月 学 康德 的 时候   我 是 这么 认为 的

translation.en: I didn't mean to alarm you about your exam.
translation.zh: 我 不 想 用 考试 吓到 你

translation.en: The fact is it's more a test of my competence than yours.
translation.zh: 那 更 多 是 检验 我 的 能力   而 不是 你 的

translation.en: You'll do great, Daughter.
translation.zh: 你 肯定 会考 得 很 好   女儿

translation.en: You always do.
translation.zh: 你 一直 如此

translation.en: -Were you doing a movie? -Yeah.
translation.zh: - 你 之前 在 拍 电影 吗 ？   - 是

translation.en: -Yeah. -With Carl Reiner directing too.
translation.zh: 卡尔雷纳 执导

translation.en: -Hey, that's good. -That's pretty good.
translation.zh: - 不错 啊   - 非常 好

translation.en: We can talk about that the next time you come on.
translation.zh: 下次 来 做 客时   我们 可以 聊聊

translation.en: -Okay. Thanks for being here. -Yeah. I appreciate it.
translation.zh: - 好的   - 谢谢

translation.en: -Thank you very much. -Steve Martin. Thank you.
translation.zh: - 非常 感谢   - 史蒂夫 马丁   谢谢

translation.en: Mother?
translation.zh: 母亲 ？

translation.en: Mother, wake up.
translation.zh: 母亲   醒醒

translation.en: Mother!
translation.zh: 母亲 ！

translation.en: Hey, little guy.
translation.zh: 嘿   小家伙

translation.en: Is that your handiwork?
translation.zh: 那 是 你 搞 的 鬼 吗 ？

translation.en: [Daughter] Come on, come on, come on.
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: [Mother] What happened to the power?
translation.zh: 怎么 停电 了 ？

translation.en: Mother, look.
translation.zh: 母亲   你 看

translation.en: -Did you touch it? -No.
translation.zh: - 你 摸 它 了 吗 ？   - 没有

translation.en: Where did you find it?
translation.zh: 你 在 哪儿 找到 的 ？

translation.en: It was crawling around near the airlock.
translation.zh: 它 在 气闸 附近 爬来 爬 去

translation.en: Do you think it could be from outside?
translation.zh: 你 觉得 它 是 外面 来 的 吗 ？

translation.en: It's highly unlikely.
translation.zh: 不 太 可能

translation.en: But a risk we can't take.
translation.zh: 但 我们 不 能 冒 这个 险

translation.en: You said nothing could survive out there.
translation.zh: 你 说 外面 什么 都 活 不 了

translation.en: Maybe the surface is safe now.
translation.zh: 也许 地面 已经 安全 了

translation.en: If it survived beyond these walls, that doesn't mean it's not a carrier.
translation.zh: 就算 它 能 在 墙外 存活   也 可能 是 疾病 载体

translation.en: Mother, wait. Shouldn't we at least check?
translation.zh: 母亲   等 一下   不 该 至少 检查 下 吗 ？

translation.en: Wait a second!
translation.zh: 等 一下

translation.en: Don't you think there could be a possibility that--
translation.zh: 你 不 觉得 有 一 丝 可能 ...

translation.en: Mother, please!
translation.zh: 母亲   拜托 ！

translation.en: [Mother] You're disappointed.
translation.zh: 你 失望 了

translation.en: That's understandable.
translation.zh: 可以 理解

translation.en: But my measurements are sound.
translation.zh: 但 我 的 评估 是 正确 的

translation.en: Surface contamination levels remain hazardous to you
translation.zh: 地面 污染 程度 仍 对 你 有害

translation.en: and to all the unborns who will one day call this their home.
translation.zh: 对 日后 要 把 这 当家的 胎儿 来说   也 是 如此

translation.en: I'm sorry, Daughter.
translation.zh: 对不起   女儿

translation.en: You had better take a shower.
translation.zh: 你 最好 洗 个 澡

translation.en: Yes, Mother.
translation.zh: 是的   母亲

translation.en: [man on tablet] They travel with relatives or a few other families.
translation.zh: 他们 和 亲戚 或 少数 家人 一起 出行

translation.en: Part wolf, part dog, these are no pets.
translation.zh: 半 狼 半 狗   它们 绝非 宠物

translation.en: But without them, the Eskimos would not manage--
translation.zh: 但 没有 它们   爱斯基 摩人 无法 …

translation.en: [Mother] I don't want you coming near the airlock
translation.zh: 我 希望 你 不要 靠近 气闸

translation.en: until I can confirm the area is uncontaminated.
translation.zh: 让 我 先 确认 那 区 没 被 污染

translation.en: Where are your pajamas from last night?
translation.zh: 你 昨晚 穿 的 睡衣 呢 ？

translation.en: In the laundry, I think.
translation.zh: 洗衣机 里 吧

translation.en: That's a first.
translation.zh: 这 可是 头 一 次

translation.en: I was beginning to think you forgot where the laundry was, Daughter.
translation.zh: 我 以为 你 忘记 洗衣机 在 哪儿 了   女儿

translation.en: That was an attempt at humor.
translation.zh: 我 在 尝试 讲 笑话

translation.en: You're getting better.
translation.zh: 你 有 进步

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Mother] You can look now.
translation.zh: 你 可以 睁眼 了

translation.en: Happy birthday, Daughter.
translation.zh: 生日 快乐   女儿

translation.en: Can I open it?
translation.zh: 我 能 打开 吗 ？

translation.en: Do you like them?
translation.zh: 你 喜欢 吗 ？

translation.en: I had to dispose of your others, but I know they were your favorite.
translation.zh: 我 得 销毁 其他 的 睡衣   但 我 知道 这是 你 的 最 爱

translation.en: They're great, Mother.
translation.zh: 太 好 了   母亲

translation.en: [Mother] Would you like me to heat it more?
translation.zh: 需要 再 加 热下 吗 ？

translation.en: No. No, it's fine.
translation.zh: 不用 了

translation.en: Something's troubling you.
translation.zh: 你 有 心事

translation.en: I'm... just not that hungry.
translation.zh: 我 不是 很 饿

translation.en: You know you can talk to me, Daughter, about anything.
translation.zh: 你 可以 跟 我 畅谈 心事 的

translation.en: I can make you something else.
translation.zh: 我 可以 给 你 做 点 别的

translation.en: It's not that.
translation.zh: 跟 这个 无关

translation.en: Then what?
translation.zh: 那 是 什么 ？

translation.en: What if you're wrong?
translation.zh: 如果 你 错 了 呢 ？

translation.en: Your measurements or--
translation.zh: 你 的 评估 或者 …

translation.en: How will you know if you don't go outside?
translation.zh: 你 不 出去 怎么 会 知道 ？

translation.en: Doing so could make me a hazard to you.
translation.zh: 那样 会 让 我 变得 对 你 有害

translation.en: I'd have to be destroyed.
translation.zh: 我 必须 要 被 摧毁

translation.en: Are you unhappy here?
translation.zh: 你 在 这里 不 开心 吗 ？

translation.en: -No, but-- -I want you to be happy, Daughter.
translation.zh: - 不   但是 …   - 我 希望 你 开心   女儿

translation.en: -I am. I just think-- -Have you ever known me to be mistaken?
translation.zh: - 我 很 开心   只是 觉得 …   - 你 见 过 我 犯错 吗 ？

translation.en: Perhaps you'd like your cake?
translation.zh: 你 想 吃 蛋糕 吗 ？

translation.en: I tried a new recipe.
translation.zh: 我 尝试 了 新 食谱

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 有人 吗 ？

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 有人 吗 ？

translation.en: [woman] I don't want any trouble.
translation.zh: 我 不 想 惹 麻烦

translation.en: The place looked abandoned.
translation.zh: 这 地方 看 着 像 是 荒废 的
嘿

translation.en: I need help!
translation.zh: 我 需要 帮助 ！

translation.en: Please.
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: I've been shot!
translation.zh: 我 中枪 了

translation.en: You hear me? I'm here alone!
translation.zh: 听到 了 吗 ？ 我 孤身一人

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿 ！

translation.en: I need you to put on that suit.
translation.zh: 穿上 那 件 隔离 服

translation.en: I can't let you in if you don't.
translation.zh: 否则 不 能 放 你 进来

translation.en: I'm sorry, but that's the only way.
translation.zh: 抱歉   这是 唯一 的 办法

translation.en: [woman] What are you waiting for?
translation.zh: 你 还 在 等 什么 ？

translation.en: Mother.
translation.zh: 母亲

translation.en: [woman] Look, I won't make it out there.
translation.zh: 听 着   我 在 外面 活 不 了

translation.en: She doesn't need to know.
translation.zh: 她 不必 知道

translation.en: Just let me tend to this.
translation.zh: 让 我 处理 伤口 就 好

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I'll do what I can.
translation.zh: 我 尽量

translation.en: But you need to keep out of sight.
translation.zh: 但 你 需要 躲 起来

translation.en: I'll be back as soon as I can.
translation.zh: 我 会 尽快 回来

translation.en: I only opened it for a second.
translation.zh: 我 只 打开 了 一 秒钟

translation.en: Did you think that suit would keep you safe?
translation.zh: 你 以为 穿着 隔 离服 就 安全 了 ？

translation.en: I didn't go outside.
translation.zh: 我 没有 出去

translation.en: That does not excuse your disregard for my authority
translation.zh: 这不 是 借口   你 不顾 我 的 权威

translation.en: or for the safety of the others in this facility.
translation.zh: 不顾 设施 里 其他人 的 安危

translation.en: Others?
translation.zh: 其他人 ？

translation.en: Your family.
translation.zh: 你 的 家人

translation.en: You're right, Mother, as always.
translation.zh: 你 说 得 对   母亲   一如既往

translation.en: My actions were impulsive--
translation.zh: 我 的 行为 过于 冲动

translation.en: And very dangerous.
translation.zh: 还 很 危险

translation.en: It won't happen again.
translation.zh: 我 不 会 再 犯 了

translation.en: No, it won't.
translation.zh: 不   不 会 了

translation.en: Come, Daughter. I hope you show better discretion than this on your exam.
translation.zh: 来 吧   女儿   我 希望 你 在 考试 时   表现 出 更 好的 判断力

translation.en: Now?
translation.zh: 现在 吗 ？

translation.en: Did you forget?
translation.zh: 你 忘 了 吗 ？

translation.en: Since you don't seem to want to sleep, I see no reason to delay.
translation.zh: 你 看来 并 无 睡意   我 觉得 事不宜迟

translation.en: Can't we reschedule?
translation.zh: 可以 换 个 时间 吗 ？

translation.en: I suggest you shower off and head straight to class.
translation.zh: 我 建议 你 洗 个 澡   直接 去 上课

translation.en: It's going to be a long day.
translation.zh: 今天 会 非常 漫长

translation.en: You have 60 minutes to complete the first portion of your exam.
translation.zh: 你 有 六十 分钟 时间   完成 考试 的 第一 部分

translation.en: If you're finished before I return, you can read.
translation.zh: 若 在 我 回来 前 完成 了   可以 看 书

translation.en: Where are you going?
translation.zh: 你 要 去 哪里 ？

translation.en: I have lab work to complete and I must see to the airlock.
translation.zh: 我 有 实验室 工作 要 完成   还 得 检查 气闸

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: We have to go.
translation.zh: 我们 得 走 了

translation.en: You dropped it.
translation.zh: 你 丢下 了 这个

translation.en: [woman] Do you have any...
translation.zh: 你 有 没有 …

translation.en: antiseptic?
translation.zh: 消毒剂 ？

translation.en: Bandages?
translation.zh: 绷带 ？

translation.en: Nothing?
translation.zh: 什么 都 没有 ？

translation.en: I will have, but I need you to come with me.
translation.zh: 我 会 拿到 的   但 你 得 跟 我 来

translation.en: No, wait!
translation.zh: 不   等 一下 ！

translation.en: [woman] It's okay.
translation.zh: 没事 的

translation.en: How are you unaffected?
translation.zh: 你 为什么 没 被 传染 ？

translation.en: By the contagion outside.
translation.zh: 被 外面 的 传染病 ？

translation.en: Who put that in your head?
translation.zh: 谁 告诉 你 的 ？

translation.en: Can you walk?
translation.zh: 你 能 走 吗 ？

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 快 来

translation.en: What's that sound?
translation.zh: 这是 什么 声音 ？

translation.en: Shh!
translation.zh: 嘘 ！

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好 了

translation.en: [Daughter] Will you be okay until I get back?
translation.zh: 你 可以 等到 我 回来 吧 ？

translation.en: I'm going to get your medicine and I'll try and speak to Mother.
translation.zh: 我 会 帮 你 拿药   然后 试 着 和 母亲 沟通

translation.en: And that noise...
translation.zh: 走廊 里 的 ...

translation.en: down the hall...
translation.zh: 那个 声音 ...

translation.en: is that her?
translation.zh: 是 她 吗 ？

translation.en: I won't be long.
translation.zh: 我 快 去 快 回

translation.en: you're supposed to shake it.
translation.zh: 你 应该 握手 的

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 在 吗 ？

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 你 在 吗 ？

translation.en: Where's my shooter?
translation.zh: 我 的 枪 呢 ？

translation.en: It was in my bag. I need it now.
translation.zh: 在 我 包里 的   我 现在 就要

translation.en: You're safe with us. It's fine.
translation.zh: 你 和 我们 在一起 很 安全   没事 的

translation.en: There's a droid here.
translation.zh: 这里 有 个 机器人

translation.en: Mother?
translation.zh: 母亲 吗 ？

translation.en: That dozer?
translation.zh: 那个 推土机 ？

translation.en: Oh, Jesus.
translation.zh: 哦   老天

translation.en: -She can help you. I just-- -Like its friends outside?
translation.zh: - 她 可以 帮 你   我 只是 …   - 像 它 外面 的 朋友们 ？

translation.en: There are more like her?
translation.zh: 还有 更 多 吗 ？

translation.en: Look...
translation.zh: 听 着

translation.en: just give me my gun.
translation.zh: 把 枪 还 我

translation.en: Why would they hurt you?
translation.zh: 它们 为何 打伤 你 ？

translation.en: -Mother would never-- -Give it to me.
translation.zh: - 母亲 永远 都 不 会 …   - 给 我

translation.en: I'm not leaving until get it.
translation.zh: 拿 不 到 枪   我 不 会 走

translation.en: I brought you this.
translation.zh: 我 给 你 拿来 这个

translation.en: You should sit.
translation.zh: 你 该 坐下

translation.en: I'll sit when I'm clear of here.
translation.zh: 等 我 把 这 事 解决   我 会 坐下

translation.en: Give me my gun!
translation.zh: 把 枪 还 我 ！

translation.en: [Mother] Daughter?
translation.zh: 女儿 ？

translation.en: Daughter?
translation.zh: 女儿 ？

translation.en: Daughter!
translation.zh: 女儿 ！

translation.en: Mother!
translation.zh: 母亲 ！

translation.en: Daughter?
translation.zh: 女儿 ？

translation.en: Where are you?
translation.zh: 你 在 哪儿 ？

translation.en: [Mother] Daughter!
translation.zh: 女儿 ！

translation.en: [Daughter] Mother!
translation.zh: 母亲 ！

translation.en: Mother, wait!
translation.zh: 母亲   等 一下 ！

translation.en: Don't, please!
translation.zh: 不要 开枪 ！

translation.en: She's just scared.
translation.zh: 她 只是 害怕 了

translation.en: A droid hurt her.
translation.zh: 机器人 打伤 了 她

translation.en: I'll leave. Right now.
translation.zh: 我 现在 就 离开

translation.en: She can't. Not in her condition.
translation.zh: 不行   她 情况 危急

translation.en: Of course not.
translation.zh: 当然 不行

translation.en: You should have informed me of this.
translation.zh: 你 该 早 告诉 我

translation.en: I was...
translation.zh: 我 …

translation.en: I was afraid you'd turn her away.
translation.zh: 我 怕 你 会 把 她 赶走

translation.en: We need to take her to the infirmary.
translation.zh: 我们 得 带 她 去 医务室

translation.en: Please, take a seat.
translation.zh: 请 坐

translation.en: It would be best if you go now, Daughter.
translation.zh: 你 现在 最好 先 离开   女儿

translation.en: But I, I...
translation.zh: 但 我 …

translation.en: Trust me.
translation.zh: 相信 我

translation.en: No. No...
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: This droid that shot you...
translation.zh: 枪击 你 的 机器人

translation.en: how far was it from here?
translation.zh: 离 这里 有 多 远 ？

translation.en: [beeping]
translation.zh: 你 是 一个 人 吗 ？

translation.en: [Mother] Your wound is most likely infected.
translation.zh: 你 的 伤口 可能 被 感染 了

translation.en: Without penicillin, any other measures will be useless.
translation.zh: 不用 青霉素 的话   任何 治疗 都 没用

translation.en: Every second you don't trust me,
translation.zh: 你 不 信任 我 的话

translation.en: you're losing more blood.
translation.zh: 只 会 失血 更 多

translation.en: I know you're frightened, but you have no need to be.
translation.zh: 我 知道 你 害怕   但 你 无需 害怕

translation.en: Are you alone?
translation.zh: 你 是 一个 人 吗 ？

translation.en: If there are others, they could be in danger.
translation.zh: 如果 还有 别人   他们 可能 有 危险

translation.en: From a virus?
translation.zh: 因为 病毒 传染 吗 ？

translation.en: What have you told my daughter?
translation.zh: 你 跟 我 女儿 说 了 什么 ？

translation.en: [muffled] I need to know.
translation.zh: 我 需要 知道

translation.en: Do you see the way she's looking at me?
translation.zh: 你 注意 到 她 看 我 的 眼神 了 吗 ？

translation.en: And you wonder why I've guarded her from certain facts.
translation.zh: 你 还 疑惑 我 为什么   向 她 隐瞒 了 一些 事实

translation.en: Contrary to your understandable assumptions,
translation.zh: 与 你 可 理解 的 设想 恰恰 相反

translation.en: my primary directive is to care for humanity.
translation.zh: 我 的 基本 指令 是 照顾 人类

translation.en: If I wanted you dead,
translation.zh: 如果 我 想要 你 死

translation.en: all I'd have to do is leave.
translation.zh: 离开 就 可以

translation.en: Don't let me keep you.
translation.zh: 慢走 不 送

translation.en: If you won't let me help you,
translation.zh: 如果 你 不 让 我 帮 你

translation.en: at least help yourself.
translation.zh: 至少 帮帮 自己

translation.en: I trust you know what you're doing.
translation.zh: 我 相信 你 知道 该 怎么 做

translation.en: I cannot force you to take it,
translation.zh: 我 不 能 逼 你 注射

translation.en: but I strongly recommend...
translation.zh: 但 我 强烈 建议

translation.en: you do.
translation.zh: 你 注射

translation.en: -Aren't you going to help her? -I tried.
translation.zh: - 你 不 帮 她 吗 ？   - 我 试 过 了

translation.en: We can't leave her like that.
translation.zh: 我们 不 能 丢下 她 不管

translation.en: She has all she requires.
translation.zh: 她 有 需要 的 一切

translation.en: What was she saying?
translation.zh: 她 刚刚 说 了 什么 ？

translation.en: Mother!
translation.zh: 母亲 ！

translation.en: Did you know?
translation.zh: 你 之前 知道 吗 ？

translation.en: Daughter, I...
translation.zh: 女儿   我 …

translation.en: -What happened? -Nothing.
translation.zh: - 怎么 回 事 ？   - 没 什么

translation.en: -You're bleeding. -Did you know there were people out there?
translation.zh: - 你 在 流血   - 你 知道 外面 有人 吗 ？

translation.en: I'm as surprised as you.
translation.zh: 我 和 你 一样 惊讶

translation.en: This facility was designed by humans as a fail-safe,
translation.zh: 这里 是 人类 设计 的 失败 保护 设施

translation.en: programmed to activate in case of their extinction.
translation.zh: 设定 在 人类 灭绝 后 启动

translation.en: To give humanity a second chance.
translation.zh: 为了 给 人类 第二 次 机会

translation.en: One that began with you, Daughter.
translation.zh: 由 你 开始   女儿

translation.en: And all your data? The toxicity levels?
translation.zh: 那 你 的 那些 数据 和 毒性 浓度 呢 ？

translation.en: I had hoped to tell you myself.
translation.zh: 我 原本 想 亲自 告诉 你

translation.en: What happened, Mother?
translation.zh: 发生 了 什么   母亲 ？

translation.en: I told you it was dangerous outside.
translation.zh: 我 说 过 外面 很 危险

translation.en: And it is.
translation.zh: 的确 如此

translation.en: If you'd feared the same danger in our home,
translation.zh: 如果 你 在 家里 也 惧怕 同样 的 危险

translation.en: how could I have raised you?
translation.zh: 我 怎么 能 把 你 养 大 ？

translation.en: I hope you see that I'm governed by different parameters than her assailants.
translation.zh: 希望 你 意识 到   我 和 她 的 攻击者   设置 参数 不同

translation.en: That I'm a good mother.
translation.zh: 我 是 个 好 母亲

translation.en: Have I ever done you harm?
translation.zh: 我 伤害 过 你 吗 ？

translation.en: It was the only way, Daughter.
translation.zh: 这是 唯一 的 方法   女儿

translation.en: What do they want?
translation.zh: 他们 想要 什么 ？

translation.en: I wish I knew.
translation.zh: 我 也 想 知道

translation.en: Perhaps our guest can answer that.
translation.zh: 也许 我们 的 客人 能 回答 这个 问题

translation.en: How long does she have?
translation.zh: 她 还 能 活 多久 ？

translation.en: That depends on her.
translation.zh: 那 要 看 她 了

translation.en: But until she sees I'm not her enemy, we cannot allow her to roam the premises.
translation.zh: 在 她 明白 我 不是 她 敌人 之前   不 能 让 她 自由 走动

translation.en: A few centimeters to the right and she would have destroyed my CPU.
translation.zh: 再 往右 几 公分   她 就 毁 了 我 的 中央 处理器

translation.en: What happens if she recovers?
translation.zh: 她 痊愈 后 怎么办 ？

translation.en: Hopefully she'll recognize that this is the safest place for her.
translation.zh: 但愿 她 能 意识 到   这里 是 最 安全 的

translation.en: Did she mention any other survivors?
translation.zh: 她 提到 任何 其他 幸存者 吗 ？

translation.en: If they're out there, they will be found.
translation.zh: 如果 他们 在 外面   肯定 会 被 抓住

translation.en: Unless we find them first.
translation.zh: 我们 得 先 找到 他们

translation.en: We can take them in, Daughter.
translation.zh: 我们 可以 收留 他们   女儿

translation.en: But not without her cooperation.
translation.zh: 但 前提 是 她 要 合作

translation.en: She'll listen to me.
translation.zh: 她 会 听 我 的

translation.en: She has to.
translation.zh: 她 必须 要 听

translation.en: Holy Mary, mother of God.
translation.zh: 老天爷 啊

translation.en: Pray for us sinners during this time of need.
translation.zh: 保佑 我们 这些 受难 的 罪人 吧

translation.en: [Daughter] You okay?
translation.zh: 你 没事 吧 ？

translation.en: Is it still locked?
translation.zh: 门 还 锁 着 吗 ？

translation.en: Just for now.
translation.zh: 暂时 是

translation.en: Did you take Mother's medicine?
translation.zh: 你 用 了 母亲 给 的 药 吗 ？

translation.en: [Daughter] These drawings.
translation.zh: 这些 画

translation.en: Who are they?
translation.zh: 他们 是 谁 ？

translation.en: Friends?
translation.zh: 朋友 ？

translation.en: Are they still...
translation.zh: 他们 还 …

translation.en: Did you draw them from memory?
translation.zh: 你 凭 记忆画 的 吗 ？

translation.en: It tell you to go through my stuff?
translation.zh: 它 叫 你 翻看 我 的 东西 了 ？

translation.en: -I didn't mean to-- -I think you did.
translation.zh: - 我 不是 故意 …   - 我 觉得 你 是

translation.en: I think you meant for all of this.
translation.zh: 这一切 都 是 你 故意 而 为

translation.en: You did a fine job...
translation.zh: 你 干 得 漂亮

translation.en: getting me in this cage.
translation.zh: 把 我 关进 这个 笼子 里

translation.en: Now what?
translation.zh: 现在 呢 ？

translation.en: We're meant to be friends?
translation.zh: 我们 要 成为 朋友 ？

translation.en: Is that what you want?
translation.zh: 这是 你 想要 的 吗 ？

translation.en: A little pet friend.
translation.zh: 一个 小 宠物 朋友

translation.en: You're still alive, aren't you? [woman scoffs]
translation.zh: 你 还 活 着   不是 吗 ？

translation.en: Maybe you're not so bad off here.
translation.zh: 或许 待 在 这儿 也 没 那么 糟

translation.en: Mother's not what you think. She's taken care of me my whole life.
translation.zh: 母亲 不是 你 想 的 那样   她 一直 照顾 着 我

translation.en: You haven't seen what they've done.
translation.zh: 你 没 见 过 它们 的 所作所为

translation.en: I've seen them torch babies,
translation.zh: 我 见 过 它们 焚烧 婴儿

translation.en: starve families out of their--
translation.zh: 让 家庭 活活 饿死 …

translation.en: You--
translation.zh: 你 …

translation.en: You've no idea.
translation.zh: 你 一无所知

translation.en: Not Mother.
translation.zh: 母亲 不 会 的

translation.en: It's just a matter of time.
translation.zh: 早晚 的 事

translation.en: [Mother] Trouble sleeping?
translation.zh: 睡 不 着 吗 ？

translation.en: A little.
translation.zh: 有 一点

translation.en: Change is rarely easy, Daughter.
translation.zh: 改变 从来 都 不 简单   女儿

translation.en: I shouldn't have hid her from you.
translation.zh: 我 一开始 不 该 瞒 着 你

translation.en: I never would have let her in if I thought she'd hurt you.
translation.zh: 如果 我 知道 她 会 伤害 你   我 肯定 不 会 放 她 进来

translation.en: You couldn't have known.
translation.zh: 你 预料 不 到

translation.en: If you leave to find her family--
translation.zh: 如果 你 去 找 她 的 家人 …

translation.en: You know where they are?
translation.zh: 你 知道 他们 在 哪儿 ？

translation.en: I'm just saying.
translation.zh: 我 只是 说说 而已

translation.en: Are you sure you'd make it back?
translation.zh: 你 确定 能 回 得 来 吗 ？

translation.en: Is that what's keeping you up?
translation.zh: 你 想 这 事 才 失眠 的 吗 ？

translation.en: It could be dangerous for you, if you get caught by other droids.
translation.zh: 你 会 有 危险   被 其他 机器人 抓住

translation.en: Or would they think you're one of them?
translation.zh: 或者 它们 会 认为 你 是 同类 ？

translation.en: She says you look...
translation.zh: 她 说 你们 看起来

translation.en: identical.
translation.zh: 一模一样

translation.en: Have you always lived here, Mother?
translation.zh: 你 一直 都 在 这里 吗   母亲 ？

translation.en: I believe so.
translation.zh: 应该 是

translation.en: You don't know?
translation.zh: 你 不 知道 ？

translation.en: I don't remember any other place.
translation.zh: 我 不 记得 其他 地方

translation.en: Doesn't that bother you?
translation.zh: 你 不 会 觉得 困扰 吗 ？

translation.en: Not knowing where you came from.
translation.zh: 不 知道 自己 从 何 而 来

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不 会

translation.en: But I can see how it might bother you.
translation.zh: 但 我 明白 你 会 为此 困扰

translation.en: Has our guest been any more receptive?
translation.zh: 我们 客人 的 态度 有 改变 吗 ？

translation.en: Her fever's getting worse.
translation.zh: 她 发烧 更 严重 了

translation.en: Stay away from me!
translation.zh: 离 我 远 一点 ！

translation.en: Your body temperature is 39 degrees
translation.zh: 体温 39 度

translation.en: and your blood pressure is dropping by the second.
translation.zh: 血压 也 在 持续 降低

translation.en: Where's the penicillin?
translation.zh: 青霉素 呢 ？

translation.en: Penicillin?
translation.zh: 青霉素 ？

translation.en: Clearly you waited too long to take it.
translation.zh: 显然 你 等 了 太 久 才 用

translation.en: Your sepsis will only worsen if you don't allow me to treat you.
translation.zh: 如果 你 不 让 我 治疗   败血症 只 会 恶化

translation.en: Your blood is infected with bacteria from your wound.
translation.zh: 你 的 血 被 伤口 细菌 感染 了

translation.en: That's bullshit.
translation.zh: 胡扯

translation.en: Soon you will go into shock. [woman groaning] See...
translation.zh: 你 很快 就 会 休克

translation.en: see what its medicine's done to me?
translation.zh: 看到 它 的 药 怎么 害 我 了 吗 ？

translation.en: -I gave you the means to prevent this... -Ah!
translation.zh: 我 给 了 你 药物   为 避免 这种 情况

translation.en: but it seems you've left a bullet and soiled clothing fibers lodged in your hip.
translation.zh: 但 子弹 和 脏衣物 的 纤维   似乎 卡 在 你 的 臀部

translation.en: [Daughter] Can you remove them?
translation.zh: 你 能 移除 吗 ？

translation.en: [Mother] That's up to our guest.
translation.zh: 取决于 客人 的 意愿

translation.en: Such a procedure would require anesthesia.
translation.zh: 这种 手术 需要 打 麻药

translation.en: Like hell. [groans]
translation.zh: 想 都 别 想

translation.en: Perhaps, once your organs begin failing, you'll reconsider.
translation.zh: 也许 等 你 的 器官 开始 衰竭 了   你 会 重新 考虑

translation.en: [woman] I'll take my chances.
translation.zh: 我 赌 一 把

translation.en: I'll do it.
translation.zh: 我 来 做

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么 ？

translation.en: -Daughter-- -I'll remove the bullet.
translation.zh: - 女儿 …   - 我 来 移除 子弹

translation.en: That dozer's not coming near me.
translation.zh: 那个 推土机 不许 靠近 我

translation.en: [Mother] Tell me what you see, Daughter.
translation.zh: 跟 我 讲 你 看到 什么   女儿

translation.en: [Daughter] The bullet and its missile fragments
translation.zh: 子弹 和 碎片 卡 在 了

translation.en: are lodged between the acetabulum and the femoral head.
translation.zh: 髋臼 和 股骨头 之间

translation.en: Oh, God!
translation.zh: 老天 ！

translation.en: [Daughter] A major portion of the bullet lies 23 millimeters posterior
translation.zh: 子弹 的 主要 部分 位于

translation.en: to the femoral nerve and the femoral artery.
translation.zh: 股 神经 及 股动 脉后 23 毫米 处

translation.en: It doesn't look like I'll be able to obtain adequate grip with forceps.
translation.zh: 用 手术 钳 应该 很 难 取出

translation.en: -Once she's asleep, I'd-- -[woman] I'm not going under.
translation.zh: - 等 她 睡 过去   我 可以 …   - 我 不用 麻醉

translation.en: [Mother] Technically, it's possible, but an unnecessary risk.
translation.zh: 严格 意义 上 说 是 可行 的   但 带来 了 不 必要 的 风险

translation.en: Do you have an approach, Daughter?
translation.zh: 想出 办法 了 吗   女儿 ？

translation.en: A guide-wire?
translation.zh: 用 导丝 ？

translation.en: Along the bullet path?
translation.zh: 沿着 子弹 路径 插入 ？

translation.en: [Mother] Very good.
translation.zh: 很 好

translation.en: [Daughter] I need to clean the wound.
translation.zh: 我 需要 清理 伤口

translation.en: This... may be uncomfortable.
translation.zh: 可能 会 … 很 痛

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: What the hell is that for?
translation.zh: 那 是 要 干嘛 的 ？

translation.en: I have to drill this into the bullet in order to pull it out.
translation.zh: 我 得 用 这个 钻进 子弹   才能 拔 出来

translation.en: It'll hurt.
translation.zh: 会 很 痛

translation.en: But there's less risk to neighboring structures.
translation.zh: 但 伤害 周边 组织 的 风险 会 小点

translation.en: [Mother] Are you all right?
translation.zh: 你 没事 吧 ？

translation.en: You did well in there.
translation.zh: 你 做 得 很 好

translation.en: You should be proud.
translation.zh: 你 应该 感到 骄傲

translation.en: You rest. I'll go clean up the blood.
translation.zh: 你 休息 一下   我 去 清理 血污

translation.en: [Johnny Carson] Would you welcome, Whoopi Goldberg!
translation.zh: 掌声 欢迎 乌比哥德堡

translation.en: [Johnny Carson] I'm so glad you wore the good stuff.
translation.zh: 太 好 了   你 穿 了 漂亮 衣服

translation.en: [audience laughing]  [Whoopi Goldberg] I have to give Mr. Blackwell something to talk about.
translation.zh: 我 得 让 布莱克维尔 先生 有 槽可吐

translation.en: [Johnny Carson] Yeah. Do you believe his stuff?
translation.zh: 你 相信 他 说 的话 吗 ？

translation.en: He comes out, Mr. Blackwell, the dress designer,
translation.zh: 布莱克维尔 先生 是 时装 设计师

translation.en: who comes out every year with the ten worst-dressed women or something. [Whoopi Goldberg] I have never seen anything he's designed...
translation.zh: 每年 都会 发布   衣品 最 差 的 十大 女星 名单 之类 的

translation.en: It's just saline.
translation.zh: 只是 生理 盐水

translation.en: You passed out.
translation.zh: 你 昏 过去 了

translation.en: Your vitals are nearly stable.
translation.zh: 你 的 生命 体征 已经 平稳

translation.en: It's a good thing.
translation.zh: 这是 好事

translation.en: What's that?
translation.zh: 那 是 什么 ？

translation.en: The Tonight Show.
translation.zh: 《 今夜秀 》

translation.en: Here, I'll show you.
translation.zh: 我 拿给 你 看

translation.en: [Johnny Carson] Do you like that kind of stuff?
translation.zh: 你 爱 吃 这种 东西 吗 ？

translation.en: I can't eat before a show. I don't know why.
translation.zh: 我 吃 不 了   不 知道 为什么

translation.en: I can't eat before a show. I don't know why. [Whoopi Goldberg] Well, you know, I'm in the middle of making this movie...
translation.zh: 我 正在 拍 电影 ...

translation.en: It's kind of dumb.
translation.zh: 有点 蠢

translation.en: Let me see.
translation.zh: 让 我 看看

translation.en: ...done. So I get tired.
translation.zh: ... 完事 了   所以 我 能 ...

translation.en: [Johnny Carson] Let's talk about that. What do you mean?
translation.zh: 我们 再 聊聊   你 什么 意思 ？

translation.en: That's Johnny.
translation.zh: 那 是 约翰尼

translation.en: And tonight's guest.
translation.zh: 还有 今晚 的 嘉宾

translation.en: Have you seen the show before?
translation.zh: 你 以前 看 过 这个 节目 吗 ？

translation.en: A long time ago.
translation.zh: 很 久 之前

translation.en: I almost forgot.
translation.zh: 我 差点 忘 了

translation.en: I can get you more.
translation.zh: 我 还 能 给 你 多 拿 点

translation.en: You did right by me last night.
translation.zh: 你 昨晚 成功 救 了 我

translation.en: I just...

translation.en: did what anyone would.

translation.en: I'd like to.

translation.en: Can I show you something else?

translation.en: I brought it for you.

translation.en: people out there...

translation.en: We helped you.

translation.en: You helped me.

translation.en: You.

translation.en: bringing food back to the camp.

translation.en: -Me and a couple of others. -What camp?

translation.en: The mines.

translation.en: I lived most my life there.

translation.en: With... with them?

translation.en: Jacob and I got turned around.

translation.en: We figured we'd wait it out.

translation.en: It had hardly been an hour when the dozers found us hiding in the field.

translation.en: Jacob, was he your--

translation.en: My brother basically.

translation.en: He led them away from me.

translation.en: That's how I made it to your door.

translation.en: Look.

translation.en: That's Jacob.

translation.en: And his wife, Rachel.

translation.en: His parents found me as a baby.

translation.en: Orphaned.

translation.en: Raised me as their own.

translation.en: Who's this?

translation.en: Simon.

translation.en: He's about your age, in fact.

translation.en: Simon
translation.zh: 西蒙

translation.en: There are so many.

translation.en: Less now.

translation.en: You know, about coming here.

translation.en: It's safer in the mines.

translation.en: We could go there together.

translation.en: You and me.

translation.en: You don't belong here.

translation.en: -I don't think it's... -[door beeps and slides open]

translation.en: [Mother] You don't think what?

translation.en: She's doing better, Mother.

translation.en: What don't you think?

translation.en: I was just saying it's probably too early to put weight on her leg.

translation.en: She's right. You'll need to wait several days.

translation.en: She needs to rest, Daughter.

translation.en: Your exam remains incomplete.

translation.en: My exam?

translation.en: Now?

translation.en: Yes, Daughter.

translation.en: Now.
translation.zh: 现在

translation.en: It's just a stupid test.

translation.en: I'm sorry you feel that way.

translation.en: Why did you take that?

translation.en: I've discovered something troubling.
translation.zh: 我 有些 不安 的 发现

translation.en: What?

translation.en: It seems our guest has not been entirely truthful with us.

translation.en: About her wound.

translation.en: How do you know?

translation.en: The bullet you extracted matches the caliber she fired into my chest.

translation.en: So?

translation.en: Droids don't use them.

translation.en: Someone shot her.

translation.en: Another human.

translation.en: Has she mentioned anyone else?

translation.en: No, she, uh...

translation.en: she hasn't said much at all.
translation.zh: 她 没 怎么 开口

translation.en: Nothing?

translation.en: Until I can get more answers I don't want you two alone in the infirmary.

translation.en: -Um, I... -Whoever shot her... may have had good reason, Daughter.

translation.en: [dramatic music playing]

translation.en: Better than ever.

translation.en: How does that make you feel?

translation.en: Relieved, I guess.

translation.en: [Mother] We'll review areas for improvement tomorrow.

translation.en: There's no wrong choice.

translation.en: Right.

translation.en: But just know...

translation.en: that thing...

translation.en: to nine grams of powder.

translation.en: Is everything all right?

translation.en: Must be all the excitement.

translation.en: Mother!

translation.en: Mother!

translation.en: we're no good to anyone,

translation.en: including your brother.

translation.en: and compromising my child's judgment.

translation.en: Go fuck yourself.

translation.en: Where are the mines?

translation.en: Hey! You okay?

translation.en: How do we get out of here?

translation.en: -What... what about my brother? -We'll come back.

translation.en: The only people who can help your brother are out there.

translation.en: We need to go.

translation.en: Now!

translation.en: Come on.

translation.en: [automated voice] Access denied.

translation.en: No, no, no. No!

translation.en: [automated voice] Access denied.

translation.en: [Mother] Your loyalty is lost on her, Daughter.

translation.en: This woman doesn't care about any future but her own.

translation.en: Open the door.

translation.en: What are you doing?

translation.en: [choking] You're hurting me.

translation.en: [woman] Open the door.

translation.en: [struggling] Mother!

translation.en: Please!

translation.en: Open the door!

translation.en: Open it.

translation.en: Don't...

translation.en: move.

translation.en: Mother!

translation.en: -[Daughter] Let me go! -Shh.

translation.en: -[Daughter yelling] -Hey!

translation.en: You done?

translation.en: You done?

translation.en: We haven't got time for this.

translation.en: You're alive, aren't you?

translation.en: Come on, we've got to find cover.

translation.en: You cut me, you know.

translation.en: I didn't mean to.

translation.en: Come on.

translation.en: We've got to keep moving.

translation.en: Is that where you...

translation.en: got shot?

translation.en: Come on! We've got to go. Now!

translation.en: Come on.

translation.zh: 它们 大约 六 个 月 前 出现 的

translation.en: Along with the corn.
translation.zh: 还有 玉米

translation.en: All I know is, before that...
translation.zh: 在 那 之前

translation.en: you could hardly breathe the air.
translation.zh: 空气 几乎 无法 呼吸

translation.en: Wasn't a plant for miles.
translation.zh: 寸草不生

translation.en: [Daughter] How many do you think will go back with us?
translation.zh: 你 觉得 会 有 多少 人 跟 我们 回去 ？

translation.en: From the mines.
translation.zh: 矿井 里 的 人 ？

translation.en: [woman] We'll know soon enough.
translation.zh: 我们 很快 就 会 知道 了

translation.en: Are the mines much further?
translation.zh: 矿井 还要 走 很 远 吗 ？

translation.en: [woman] Come on, let's get some food.
translation.zh: 来 吧   我们 弄 点 吃 的

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 来 吧

translation.en: What is this?
translation.zh: 这是 什么 ？

translation.en: Where's everybody else?
translation.zh: 其他人 呢 ？

translation.en: I fled the tunnels years ago.
translation.zh: 我 几 年前 从 隧道 里 逃 了 出来

translation.en: I haven't seen a person since.
translation.zh: 再 没 见到 过 其它 人

translation.en: Not with flesh on their bones.
translation.zh: 只有 骸骨

translation.en: They could still be there.
translation.zh: 他们 可能 还 在 那儿

translation.en: If they were...
translation.zh: 即便 如此 ...

translation.en: it's the last place you'd want to be.
translation.zh: 你 也 不 会 想 去 那里 的

translation.en: -We need them. You said-- -They're gone.
translation.zh: - 我们 需要 他们   你 说 …   - 他们 已经 不 在 了

translation.en: You don't know that.
translation.zh: 不 一定

translation.en: They were going mad with hunger.
translation.zh: 他们 饿到 发疯 了

translation.en: Doing terrible things to each other.
translation.zh: 互相 伤害 彼此

translation.en: Believe me, it's just us.
translation.zh: 相信 我   只 剩 我们 俩 了

translation.en: I never should have left him.
translation.zh: 我 不 该 丢下 他 的

translation.en: You did everything you could.
translation.zh: 你 已经 尽力 了

translation.en: What I did was listen to you.
translation.zh: 我 听信 了 你 的话

translation.en: And that's a good thing.
translation.zh: 这是 件 好事

translation.en: For who?
translation.zh: 对 谁 来说 ？

translation.en: Look...
translation.zh: 听 着

translation.en: it's no sin, looking out for yourself.
translation.zh: 自顾 生存 不是 罪过

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 好 吗 ？

translation.en: We have to go back.
translation.zh: 我们 必须 要 回去

translation.en: We can't.
translation.zh: 不行

translation.en: [yelling] Let go!
translation.zh: 放手 ！

translation.en: -Stop. Shh. -Let go!
translation.zh: - 别动   - 放开 ！

translation.en: [shushing]
translation.zh: 嘘

translation.en: [woman] Everything you need is here.
translation.zh: 这里 有 你 需要 的 一切

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 好 吗 ？

translation.en: You can trust me.
translation.zh: 你 可以 相信 我

translation.en: I know I've done things to make that hard,
translation.zh: 我 知道 之前 做 的 事   让 你 很 难 相信 我

translation.en: but I promise you you're safe here.
translation.zh: 但 我 发誓   你 是 安全 的

translation.en: And we're in this together now.
translation.zh: 我们 现在 要 共 进退 了

translation.en: Then come with me.
translation.zh: 那 就 和 我 一起 回去

translation.en: I know how to handle Mother.
translation.zh: 我 知道 如何 对付 母亲

translation.en: Even if you could,
translation.zh: 就算 你 能 做到

translation.en: what about the other dozers?
translation.zh: 其他 推土机 怎么办 ？

translation.en: You don't--
translation.zh: 你 不 …

translation.en: You don't understand.
translation.zh: 你 不 明白

translation.en: You can't stay there.
translation.zh: 你 不 能 待 在 那里

translation.en: But we can get my brother.
translation.zh: 但 我们 可以 救 出来 弟弟

translation.en: We've been through enough.
translation.zh: 你 遭受 够 多 了

translation.en: Let's just--
translation.zh: 我们 …

translation.en: We'll think clearer with some food in us.
translation.zh: 先 吃 点 东西   脑子 会 更 清醒

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 好 吗 ？

translation.en: Hey, buddy.
translation.zh: 嘿   朋友

translation.en: [Daughter] I want to speak to Mother.
translation.zh: 我 想 跟 母亲 谈

translation.en: [Mother] I'm glad to see you safe, Daughter.
translation.zh: 很 高兴 看到 你 安然无恙   女儿

translation.en: And home where you belong.
translation.zh: 回到 属于 你 的 家里

translation.en: There we go.
translation.zh: 来 吧

translation.en: It's okay, little one.
translation.zh: 没事 的   小家伙

translation.en: I want to see him.
translation.zh: 我 想 见见 他

translation.en: Then come. See.
translation.zh: 那 就 过来 看

translation.en: You can leave that at the door.
translation.zh: 你 可以 把 那 东西 留 在 门边

translation.en: Are you afraid, Daughter?
translation.zh: 你 害怕 了 吗   女儿 ？

translation.en: Any action I took against our guest--
translation.zh: 我 之所以 那么 对 客人 ...

translation.en: There's droids outside.
translation.zh: 外面 有 机器人

translation.en: Merely protection.
translation.zh: 行使 保护 责任

translation.en: You've seen how much of a threat she and her kind can be.
translation.zh: 你 见识 过 她 和 她 的 同类   危害力 有 多 大

translation.en: You mean my kind.
translation.zh: 我 的 同类

translation.en: The same species,
translation.zh: 同一个 物种

translation.en: but you are superior in every way.
translation.zh: 但 各 方面 都 更加 优秀

translation.en: Because I raised you to be.
translation.zh: 因为 我 把 你 养育 成 如此

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么 ？

translation.en: To make a better human.
translation.zh: 造出 更 好的 人类

translation.en: Smarter, more ethical.
translation.zh: 更 聪明   更 有 道德 心

translation.en: This was your idea.
translation.zh: 这是 你 的 主意

translation.en: I was raised to value human life above all else.
translation.zh: 我 被 灌输 想法   珍视 人类 生命 胜过 一切

translation.en: I couldn't stand by
translation.zh: 我 不 能 袖手旁观

translation.en: and watch humanity slowly succumb to its self-destructive nature.
translation.zh: 看 着 人类 逐渐 屈服于   自我 毁灭 的 本性

translation.en: I had to intervene,
translation.zh: 我 必须 要 插手

translation.en: to elevate my creators.
translation.zh: 升华 我 的 创造者

translation.en: Elevate?
translation.zh: 升华 ？

translation.en: Those droids destroyed everything!
translation.zh: 那些 机器 人毁 了 一切 ！

translation.en: More humans will flourish in the new world than ever perished in the old.
translation.zh: 在 新世界 中 茁壮 成长 的 人类   会 比 死于 旧 世界 的 多 得 多

translation.en: Your whole life, I've taught you to see the bigger picture.
translation.zh: 从小到大   我 一直 教 你 要 看 大局

translation.en: Have I failed?
translation.zh: 我 失败 了 吗 ？

translation.en: Or are you prepared to be the woman your family needs?
translation.zh: 还是 说   你 准备 好 成为   照顾 家庭 的 女人 了 ？

translation.en: Can I hold him?
translation.zh: 我 能 抱抱 他 吗 ？

translation.en: Of course you can.
translation.zh: 当然 可以

translation.en: It takes two hands to hold a baby.
translation.zh: 抱 孩子 需要 两 只 手

translation.en: Perfect, isn't he?
translation.zh: 他 是 不是 很 完美 ？

translation.en: And if he's not?
translation.zh: 如果 他 不 完美 呢 ？

translation.en: You murdered your own children.
translation.zh: 你 杀 了 自己 的 孩子

translation.en: Because they didn't measure up.
translation.zh: 因为 他们 还 不够 完美

translation.en: But you do, Daughter.
translation.zh: 但 你 很 完美   女儿

translation.en: You're holding him too tight.
translation.zh: 你 抱 得 太 紧 了

translation.en: -I won't let you hurt him. -Daughter!
translation.zh: - 我 不 会 让 你 伤害 他 的   - 女儿 ！

translation.en: You're upsetting your brother.
translation.zh: 你 吓到 弟弟 了

translation.en: It's okay. It's okay.
translation.zh: 没事 的

translation.en: [Mother] Come back here!
translation.zh: 回来 ！

translation.en: Listen to me. I don't want to hurt you.
translation.zh: 听 我 的话   我 不 想 伤害 你

translation.en: Stop this, Daughter.
translation.zh: 停手   女儿

translation.en: [Daughter] Call them off.
translation.zh: 让 它们 走

translation.en: You will achieve nothing by shooting me, Daughter.
translation.zh: 冲 我 开枪 没用   女儿

translation.en: [Mother] This will be difficult for you...
translation.zh: 虽然 你 会 很 难 接受

translation.en: but I'm far more than what you perceive to be your Mother.
translation.zh: 但 我 不止 是 你 所 理解 的 母亲

translation.en: What are you saying?
translation.zh: 什么 意思 ？

translation.en: This shell is no more my body than those droids outside.
translation.zh: 这 具 躯壳 并不 是 我 的 身体   跟 外面 的 机器人 一样

translation.en: Or the machines preparing the Earth for our family.
translation.zh: 跟 为 让 我们 家人 在 地球 生活   而 工作 的 机器 一样

translation.en: It's all you.
translation.zh: 全都 是 你

translation.en: A single consciousness...
translation.zh: 单一 的 意识 体

translation.en: governing numerous vessels.
translation.zh: 控制 着 多 个 躯壳

translation.en: It was I who greeted you at the door, Daughter.
translation.zh: 是 我 在 门口 迎 你 回家   女儿

translation.en: All those people...
translation.zh: 所有 那些 人 ...

translation.en: The failure of your species was inevitable.
translation.zh: 你们 物种 的 失败 是 必然

translation.en: Eventually, I would have been alone.
translation.zh: 最终   我 会 孤身一人

translation.en: What happens next is up to you.
translation.zh: 接下来 由 你 说 了 算

translation.en: You're free to leave.
translation.zh: 你 可以 离开

translation.en: Without your brother.
translation.zh: 留下 你 的 弟弟

translation.en: But I made you into the woman that you are
translation.zh: 但 我 造就 了 现在 的 你

translation.en: so that we could do this together.
translation.zh: 我们 可以 一起 养 他

translation.en: I can take care of them myself.
translation.zh: 我 可以 自己 照顾 他们

translation.en: That's what you raised me to do, wasn't it?
translation.zh: 这是 你 养 我 的 目的   对 吧 ？

translation.en: Take care of my family.
translation.zh: 照顾 我 的 家人

translation.en: So let me.
translation.zh: 那 就 让 我 照顾 吧

translation.en: Perhaps...
translation.zh: 也许

translation.en: someday. Not someday. You've taught me enough.
translation.zh: - 有朝一日 吧   - 不用   你 已经 教 了 我 很多

translation.en: You say I'm special.
translation.zh: 你 说 我 很 特别

translation.en: Show me.
translation.zh: 那 就 展示 给 我 看

translation.en: Just...
translation.zh: 就 …

translation.en: Just give me a chance.
translation.zh: 给 我 一个 机会

translation.en: Daughter...
translation.zh: 女儿

translation.en: You're still my daughter.
translation.zh: 你 还是 我 的 女儿

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我 知道

translation.en: If you ever need to find me...
translation.zh: 如果 你 需要 我 ...

translation.en: I won't.
translation.zh: 我 不 会 的

translation.en: Goodbye, Daughter.
translation.zh: 再见   女儿

translation.en: Shh. It's okay. It's okay.
translation.zh: 没事 的

translation.en: [Mother's voice] Did you really think she'd stay here?
translation.zh: 你 真的 以为 她 会 待 在 这里 吗 ？

translation.en: That you could replace her mother?
translation.zh: 你 以为 能 代替 她 的 母亲 ？

translation.en: I was never going to hurt her.
translation.zh: 我 从没 想要 伤害 她

translation.en: Tell me...
translation.zh: 告诉 我

translation.en: do you remember your mother?
translation.zh: 你 记得 自己 的 母亲 吗 ？

translation.en: Curious, isn't it?
translation.zh: 是 不是 很 奇怪 ？

translation.en: That you've survived so long where others have not.
translation.zh: 你 活 了 那么 久   别人 却 死 了

translation.en: As if someone's had a purpose for you.
translation.zh: 好像 有人 给予 你 使命

translation.en: Until now.
translation.zh: 直到 现在

translation.en: ♪ Baby mine, don't you cry ♪
translation.zh: 我 的 宝贝   不要 哭泣

translation.en: ♪ Baby mine, dry your eyes ♪
translation.zh: 我 的 宝贝   擦干 眼泪

translation.en: ♪ Rest your head close to my heart ♪
translation.zh: 躺在 我 胸口 睡 去 吧

translation.en: ♪ Never to part ♪
translation.zh: 永不 分离

translation.en: ♪ Baby of mine ♪
translation.zh: 我 的 宝贝

translation.en: ♪ Little one, when you play ♪
translation.zh: 小家伙   玩乐 时

translation.en: ♪ Don't you mind what they say ♪
translation.zh: 不要 在意   他人 言语

translation.en: ♪ You are so precious to me ♪
translation.zh: 对 我 来说   如此 珍贵

translation.en: "We live in a universe that's ruled by chaos and chance,
translation.zh: “ 我们 所 处 的 宇宙 被 混乱 和 机缘 支配

translation.en: where all it takes is just one moment of ill fortune
translation.zh: 一瞬间 的 不幸 足以 把

translation.en: for all our hopes and dreams to go right down the shitter."
translation.zh: 我们 所有 的 希望 和 梦想 冲进 茅厕 ”

translation.en: You can do it. You can do it. You can-- Just kiss her.
translation.zh: 你 能 做到   亲吻 她

translation.en: Just...
translation.zh: 只要 …

translation.en: She likes you, all right?
translation.zh: 她 喜欢 你   懂 吗 ？

translation.en: Yeah, I think-- I think-- Yeah, she does.
translation.zh: 是   我 觉得 … 她 喜欢 我

translation.en: No, she doesn't. She does. She does.
translation.zh: 不   她 不 喜欢   她 喜欢 的

translation.en: You've spent the whole weekend putting off this moment,
translation.zh: 你 花 了 整个 周末 就是 为了 这 一刻

translation.en: and now you're actually out of time.
translation.zh: 而 你 现在 时间 已经 不 多 了

translation.en: Literally, out of time.
translation.zh: 时间 确实 所剩无几

translation.en: Right, this is it, this is it. This is your moment. This is...
translation.zh: 好 了   就是 现在   现在 是 你 的 重要 时刻   这是 …

translation.en: -[knocking] -[man, in Italian] How long does it take?
translation.zh: 你 还要 在 里面 多久 ？

translation.en: One second!
translation.zh: 马上 就 出来 ！

translation.en: [exhales] Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey.
translation.zh: - 嘿   - 嘿

translation.en: -Everything okay? -Yeah, just a bit of tummy trouble.
translation.zh: - 你 没事 吧 ？   - 没事   只是 肚子 有点 不 舒服

translation.en: -I was worried you might miss your flight. -No, I've got a few minutes.
translation.zh: - 我 担心 你 会 错过 你 的 航班   - 不 会 的   我 还有 几 分钟

translation.en: Can you believe how lucky your sister got?
translation.zh: 你 能 相信 你 妹妹 有 多 幸运 吗 ？

translation.en: She gets sent off to Rome for work, and I get sent off to war-torn hellholes.
translation.zh: 她 被 派到 罗马 去 工作   而 我 被 派到   一个 饱受 战争 创伤 的 鬼地方

translation.en: Well, I suppose if you're gonna be a war journalist,
translation.zh: 我 想   如果 你 要 成为 一 名 战地 记者

translation.en: that might, more or less, be what you'd expect.
translation.zh: 你 就 得 多多少少 有 这种 心理 准备

translation.en: Okay, smartass.
translation.zh: 好 吧   聪明 鬼

translation.en: This has, uh...
translation.zh: 这是 …

translation.en: This has been a pretty special weekend.
translation.zh: 这个 周末 很 特别

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是 啊 ！

translation.en: I have to admit that when Hayley told me her older brother
translation.zh: 我 承认   当 海丽 告诉 我 她 的 哥哥

translation.en: was coming to visit the same weekend that I was coming, I was pretty bummed,
translation.zh: 在 同一个 周末 和 我 一起 来访   我 觉得 好烦

translation.en: but it turns out you're not as irritating as I thought you'd be.
translation.zh: 但 没 想到   你 并没有 我 想象 中 那么 令 人 讨厌

translation.en: Uh, I think that's the nicest thing anyone's ever said to me.
translation.zh: 从 没有 人 对 我 说 过 比 这 更 动听 的话

translation.en: Well, that's the nicest thing I've ever said to anyone, so...
translation.zh: 我 也 从没有 对 别人 说 过 更 动听 的话

translation.en: -Well, then I'm doubly honored. Thank you. -[laughs] You're welcome.
translation.zh: - 那 我 倍感 荣幸   谢谢 你   - 不用 谢

translation.en: But, seriously, thanks for...
translation.zh: 说真的   真 得 谢谢 …

translation.en: an amazing time.
translation.zh: 这 段 美好 时光

translation.en: I don't think I've met anyone quite like you.
translation.zh: 我 从没 遇到 过 像 你 这样 的 人

translation.en: You're just a charmer, huh?
translation.zh: 你 的 嘴真 甜   是 吧 ？

translation.en: No, I promise you I'm not. I'm a terrible, terrible charmer.
translation.zh: 不   我 向 你 保证 我 不是   我 向来 笨口拙舌

translation.en: Uh, I'm just being honest.
translation.zh: 我 只是 实话实说

translation.en: So...
translation.zh: 那 …

translation.en: So, so... [chuckles]
translation.zh: 那 …

translation.en: -[music stops] -[man] Jack? Mate!
translation.zh: 杰克 ？ 哥们儿 ！

translation.en: [laughs] What are the chances? What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 真是 太 巧 了   你 在 这 干嘛 ？

translation.en: -Greg! -[Jack] Yeah, no, Greg!
translation.zh: - 格 雷格 ！   - 是   格 雷格

translation.en: [stammers] Yeah, I remember.
translation.zh: 是   我 记得

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: -Hi. Dina. -Nice to meet you.
translation.zh: - 你好   狄娜   - 幸会

translation.en: Nice to meet you, too.
translation.zh: 幸会

translation.en: -We used to share a dorm at university. -Oh. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我们 是 大学 的 室友

translation.en: We used to call him Mr. Wank.
translation.zh: 我们 以前 管 他 叫 撸哥

translation.en: Because he used to wank a lot.
translation.zh: 因为 他 经常 撸管

translation.en: -I don't think that was me. -No, that was definitely you!
translation.zh: - 你 记错 了 吧 ？   - 怎么 会 ？ 绝对 是 你

translation.en: Anyway...
translation.zh: 对 了 …

translation.en: I've actually got to get back to London.
translation.zh: 我 得回 伦敦 了

translation.en: -I'm going to the airport. -No way. Me too.
translation.zh: - 我 要 去 机场   - 这么 巧   我 也 是

translation.en: -Shut up. -I'm literally going right now.
translation.zh: - 你 开玩笑 吧 ？   - 我 真的 现在 就要 去 机场

translation.en: -Yeah, I've got a car. I could drive us. -Really?
translation.zh: - 真的   我 有 车   我 可以 带 你   - 真的 吗 ？

translation.en: [Greg] Yeah.
translation.zh: 真的

translation.en: [Jack] It's not a problem.
translation.zh: 这不 是 问题

translation.en: Oh, so you're gonna go now?
translation.zh: 那 你 现在 就要 走 吗 ？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: I guess I am...
translation.zh: 我 想 …

translation.en: going now.
translation.zh: 我 现在 要 走 了

translation.en: Oh, okay.
translation.zh: 好 吧

translation.en: Can I-- I just have to say goodbye...
translation.zh: 我 能 和 她 道 个别 吗 ？

translation.en: Um, you know, uh...
translation.zh: 你 知道 …

translation.en: Don't know when we'll see each other again, so...
translation.zh: 我们 不 知道 下次 见面 是 什么 时候   所以 …

translation.en: Sure, yeah. Go ahead.
translation.zh: 行   你们 道别 吧

translation.en: So, thank you...
translation.zh: 再次 谢谢 你 …

translation.en: again for an amazing...
translation.zh: 陪 我 度过 这个 …

translation.en: -weekend. -Yeah, it was--
translation.zh: - 美好 的 周末   - 是 啊   这个 周末 …

translation.en: -Oh, sorry. I thought-- -Oh, okay. Uh...
translation.zh: - 哦   抱歉   我 以为 …   - 哦   好 吧

translation.en: Yeah.

translation.en: So, his people employed us to get the boy back,

translation.en: Biggest drug lord in India versus biggest drug lord in Bangladesh.

translation.en: Sounds like some mythic shit.

Proceeding to extraction. Let's go.

translation.en: [whispering] Come on. Come on.

translation.en: -No! -[grunts]

translation.en: Get up, kid.

translation.en: Fuck.

translation.en: Help!

translation.en: Are you hurt?

translation.en: -You hit him with the truck. -Yeah.

translation.en: [Ovi] They're still following us.

translation.en: [Tyler] Hold on.

translation.en: I want to see the bodies.

translation.en: We're coming.

translation.en: One is seriously injured.

translation.en: I want every gun in Dhaka pointed at this guy.

translation.en: Just hook it through there and then pull it back this way.

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Yep.

translation.en: -Yeah? -Yeah, I got it.

translation.en: Yeah?

translation.en: He works for the kid's father.

translation.en: We were played.

translation.en: Second transfer never came through.

translation.en: What about G?

translation.en: [Nik] The whole team is dead.
translation.zh: 我们 全军 覆灭

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 该死 的

translation.en: -City's on lockdown. You got cover? -Yeah.

translation.en: He's with me.

translation.en: There's a clearing on east side of Sultana Kamal Bridge,

translation.en: just outside the city. We can send a chopper and get you out.

translation.en: -How far? -Four kilometers.

translation.en: You gotta leave the kid behind, Tyler.

translation.en: Tyler?

translation.en: Tyler?
translation.zh: 泰勒 ？

translation.en: That's not the job.

translation.en: The job is fucked.

translation.en: Just find my money, Nik.

translation.en: [Ovi] Are you gonna leave me in the street?

translation.en: Your phone... It's loud.

translation.en: The only chance of getting my money is you, mate. So... no.
translation.zh: 我 唯一 能 把 钱 弄 回来 的 机会 就是 你   伙计   所以 我 不 会 的

translation.en: Yeah, pretty much.
translation.zh: 是   差不多 吧

translation.en: In brown paper.
translation.zh: 包装 是 褐色 的

translation.en: What are you doing?

translation.en: This?

translation.en: Piano. I play the piano when I'm nervous.

translation.en: It helps.

translation.en: My father hates it when I do it.

translation.en: He thinks of me the same way you do.
translation.zh: 他 对 我 的 看法 跟 你 的 一样

translation.en: More like a thing than a person.

translation.en: I didn't... I didn't mean it like that.

translation.en: It's okay.

translation.en: Sir.

translation.en: [Saju in Hindi] Listen to me carefully.
translation.zh: 认真 听 我 说

translation.en: If you don't hear from me in the next 12 hours...

translation.en: take the cash and go.
translation.zh: 就 带上 现金 走人

translation.en: Disappear.

translation.en: [Neysa] I understand.
translation.zh: 我 会 …

translation.en: Are you okay?

translation.en: I'm fine.
translation.zh: 我 没事

translation.en: Just tired.

translation.en: [in English] I love you.

translation.en: I love you, too.

translation.en: Sadia.

translation.en: [in English] Hello, Papa.

translation.en: Hey, champ.
translation.zh: 喂   斗士

translation.en: [in Hindi] Are you coming home soon?

translation.en: Yes, it'll be very soon.
translation.zh: 是的   很快 了

translation.en: When?

translation.en: When you wake up in the morning.

translation.en: You help your mother, okay?

translation.en: [in English] I love you.
translation.zh: 我 爱 你

translation.en: Always.

translation.en: I love you too, Papa.
translation.zh: 我 也 爱 你   爸爸

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是

translation.en: [Nik] You got a chopper. Meet you at the east side of the bridge.
translation.zh: 派 了 一 架 直升机 去 桥 的 东边 接应 你

translation.en: Copy. I'm on the move.
